summary: 17 CFR § 230.506 provides exemptions for limited securities offerings without dollar limits, requiring compliance with §§ 230.501 and 230.502, and either limiting non-accredited investors and capping purchasers at 35 every 90 days, or ensuring all purchasers are accredited investors with verified status. Additionally, it disqualifies offerings involving "bad actors" with relevant criminal, regulatory, or civil violations.
